definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Huaxi, in the southern outskirts of Guiyang, is the typical suburban agriculture area in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 花溪区地处贵阳市南郊，是贵州典型的城郊农业区。

sentences.english: Forested areas sustain almost as high a population as the agricultural sites.
sentences.chinese: 森林区的种群密度与农业区同样的高。

sentences.english: It has been the main agriculture region of China in Huangfan Plain from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 黄泛平原在历史上一直是我国的主要农业区。

sentences.english: It is a trade and manufacturing center in an irrigated farming region. Population, 29, 034.
sentences.chinese: 为灌溉农业区的贸易和制造业中心。

sentences.english: It is a manufacturing center in an agricultural region. Population, 5,33.
sentences.chinese: 它是一个农业区的加工制造中心。

definition: Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
Sanjiang or Three rivers plain in Heilongjiang, vast wetland watered by Heilongjiang 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] or Amur, Songhua 松花江[Song1 hua1 jiang1], Ussuri 烏蘇里江|乌苏里江[Wu1 su1 li3 jiang1]
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
